chapters.title: Chapter 16:  The Subject of Negotiations
chapters.info: Romanda Cassin, p. 404 (485)—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah with solid gray hair and a high soprano voice. She is the eldest of the Sitters in the Hall of the Little Tower. She sat in the Hall for eighty years before retiring, and came out of her retirement when news of Siuan and Leane came to her. She now leads one of the two factions in the Hall of the Tower under Egwene. See also Akashi, Lelaine.
